00052 typedef boost::uint_t<std::numeric_limits<doubledigit_t>::digits / 2>::fast
00053     digit_t;

00057 const size_t        bits_per_digit    = std::numeric_limits<digit_t>::digits;
00058 const digit_t       digit_hibit       = (digit_t(1) << (bits_per_digit-1));
00059 const doubledigit_t doubledigit_hibit = (doubledigit_t(1) << (bits_per_digit*2-1));
00060 const doubledigit_t digit_overflowbit = (doubledigit_t(1) << bits_per_digit);
00061 const digit_t       digit_mask        = digit_t(digit_overflowbit-1);

00068 template <int digit_count=1>
00069 struct data_t {
00070     size_t copies, length, max_length;
00071     digit_t magnitude[digit_count];
00072 };
